title: This Republican Is A Threat To The Republic, Liberty And Freedom (Ep 1667)
description:
In this episode I address the disturbing public comments by this alleged Republican which should frighten liberty loving Patriots everywhere. 

News Picks:


Biden is lying about the “Build Back Worse” plan.


The Omicron fear campaign continues.

Crime is out of control in liberal cities across America. 


Now we know why the establishment has objected to early coronavirus treatment. 


Is food the most powerful weapon we have against Chinese communist party aggression?

Some nuggets from Mark Meadow’s new book.

Congressional subpoenas are limited, and the January 6th committee is outside its scope.
